name: Stack Ball Game
description:
Enjoy the fun of playing with balls.

Stack ball games are a good quality of stack ball 3d game.

Game features

  • Suitable for all ages
  • Excellent graphics
  • Relaxing music
  • Pleasure for game lovers

How to play

A fun and exciting game for kids that provides learning opportunities for both short and long term. The Stack Ball is easy to play, but it can be used by adults as well. In fact, the game is so easy that even beginner players can win some times!

Game controls

Desktop

Use the right click button to move balls.

Mobile

Tap on the ball to move.

Controls and indicators

Upper left side of the screen has the pause button

The scores and  levels are shown in the upper middle of the screen.
